name: Conversational Love
description:
Imagine it's the year 3032, you're on a date in a cave talking to a monster that came out of nowhere and you can only talk by playing guitar hero or through dialog options mapped to keys 1-6 all because your haunted by a ghost sent down by a death god to curse you, hearing the 'Rhythm of Conversation'. That is this game.

Super short, maybe a little buggy but hopefully interesting and maybe fun.
